AboutMe.Parrafo: I am a Full-Stack Web Developer with a focus on Front-End, with a strong motivation to expand my knowledge in all areas of web development. I am a detail-oriented, efficient, and productive person who values working following best practices and has effective communication, leadership, and teamwork skills.

EmailSection.Title: Contact Me!
EmailSection.P1: I am currently seeking new opportunities to advance my career in the field of information technology (IT) and contribute to the growth of an organization. I am excited to explore challenging roles and collaborate on innovative projects that allow me to develop and apply my skills.
EmailSection.P2: Feel free to contact me, and I will get back to you as soon as possible!
